title: What is the definition of learning? - Quora

response.answer_text: Learning means to know new things, to improve our think, knowledge, attitude, skill. Improving our knowledge to invent new things. Learn good things only, learning experience is the good teacher, Knowledge is one of the important thing to find out, communicate, invent and to teach. Mainly learning teaches you to how to manage or participate in different fields. You can learn through Books, Social Media, Communication etc. By learning you can improve your behavior, attitude, discipline, idea and other activities. Learn and teach others to good things.

In a Machine Learning context (as your tag implies), I would answer this with: “A computer program is said to learn from experience E with respect to some task T and some performance measure P, if its performance on T, as measured by P, improves with experience E.” (Tom Mitchell)
